LanguageData.Bionicle.JumpDesc: Leap to a targetted location (5 second cooldown)
LanguageData.Bionicle.CreateCloneDesc: Creates a hologram clone for 10 seconds
LanguageData.Bionicle.DownPawnDesc: Forces a pawn down, lasts for 20 seconds (30 second cooldown)
LanguageData.Bionicle.ChangeMentalStateDesc: Make a pawn go berserk or calm down, ineffective against scaria (15 second cooldown)
LanguageData.Bionicle.StunPawnDesc: Stuns pawn for 5 seconds (7.5 second cooldown)
LanguageData.Bionicle.DisarmPawnDesc: Pulls a weapon out of a pawn's hands (10 second cooldown)
LanguageData.Bionicle.WallRaiseDesc: Creates a barrier of stone (10 second cooldown)
LanguageData.Bionicle.PullDesc: Pulls a pawn across the map to the targetted location
LanguageData.Bionicle.TameDesc: Instantly tame any animal or wild pawn (1 day cooldown)
